results.idea: Short-term momentum (20-day zscore of returns)
results.description: Used rsk62_1_100_return (high userCount/alphaCount). Applied SUGGESTION1 by using a primary return field; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (not a vector). Coverage high so ts_backfill not needed. Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence set to 0.78 because short-term momentum is a robust, widely-observed effect.

results.idea: Volatility-adjusted momentum
results.description: Combine rsk62_1_100_return and rsk62_risk_volatility to normalize momentum by volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 datafields). Both have high coverage so no ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4 satisfied by using high-use fields. Implementation respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.75 due to improved risk-adjustment.

results.idea: Liquidity-timing: favor momentum in high ADV names
results.description: Combine ts_zscore of returns with beta to log(adv20) exposure. Used rsk62_1_100_return and rsk62_beta_5_100_logadv20 (high userCount). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. No vector ops required. Confidence 0.70 because liquidity improves implementability.

results.idea: Mean-reversion: 5-day reversal
results.description: Use short-term mean reversion on rsk62_1_100_return. Applied SUGGESTION1 (single primary field acceptable). No ts_backfill needed. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.65 reflecting short-term reversal reliability.

results.idea: Momentum minus industry momentum (industry-neutral momentum)
results.description: Subtract industry time-series mean (rsk62_industry_1_100_val100) from instrument returns (rsk62_1_100_return). SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Both coverage=1 so no backfill. Keeps under operator/datafield caps. Confidence 0.73 because removing industry drift isolates stock-level momentum.

results.idea: Idiosyncratic return (return net of common factor)
results.description: Compute return minus factor exposure using rsk62_1_100_return and rsk62_factor_1_100_val24. SUGGESTION1 used. Used high-use factor where available. Coverage=1 so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.68: isolates stock-specific moves.

results.idea: Vector-averaged factor momentum (vec_avg of factor retseries)
results.description: Use rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val18 (vector-type retseries). Applied SUGGESTION2 with vec_avg, and SUGGESTION1 implicitly (single vector). Coverage=1 so no backfill. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.66 because aggregated intra-day factor momentum can be noisy.

results.idea: Industry rotation: compare industry 5-day vs 20-day returns
results.description: Use rsk62_retseries_industry_5_100_val20 to detect industry strength. SUGGESTION2 applied (vector series) with vec_avg; used single datafield per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.62 because industry momentum can be exploited with sector rotation.

results.idea: Low-beta long-short (zscore of inverse beta)
results.description: Use rsk62_beta_1_100_pb (beta proxy high userCount). Implement inverse of beta cross-sectionally to favor low-beta. SUGGESTION1 used one high-use field. No backfill required. Confidence 0.69 for low-beta premium persistence.

results.idea: High-specific-risk contrarian
results.description: Use rsk62_1_100_ksrs (specific risks). Apply SUGGESTION1. Favor stocks with large idiosyncratic variance performing badly (mean-reversion). Coverage high; no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.60 (idiosyncratic signals are mixed).

results.idea: Earnings productivity momentum (nipe growth vs market)
results.description: Combine rsk62_risk_nipe (net income per employee) and returns. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields) and SUGGESTION4 uses high userCount for nipe. No backfill. Confidence 0.67: fundamental productivity tends to predict returns.

results.idea: Book-to-price reversal (PB-based contrarian)
results.description: Use rsk62_beta_1_100_pb and short-term return reversal. SUGGESTION1 applied. High userCount for pb used. Confidence 0.64 as value effects persist but vary over time.

results.idea: Liquidity pullback: favor dips in liquid names
results.description: Combine rsk62_1_100_return and rsk62_logadv20_di. SUGGESTION1 used; rsk62_logadv20_di has high userCount. No ts_backfill. Confidence 0.63 because liquid-name pullbacks are often mean-reverting.

results.idea: Long-term momentum (60-day ts_ir style)
results.description: Use ts_ir on 60-day returns rsk62_1_100_return to capture information ratio momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.76 for sustained trend signals.

results.idea: Short-term momentum scaled by ADV
results.description: Scale 10-day momentum by logadv beta rsk62_beta_5_100_logadv20. SUGGESTION1 used (2 fields). Both high-coverage. Confidence 0.68 for improved tradeability.

results.idea: Factor divergence: factor return minus industry return
results.description: Subtract industry retseries from factor retseries using rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val1 and rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val20. SUGGESTION2 used (vector fields) with vec_avg or ts_zscore. Coverage high. Confidence 0.61 because cross-factor divergence can be transient.

results.idea: Quality momentum: returns times gross margin zscore
results.description: Combine rsk62_1_100_return with rsk62_risk_margin (gross margin). SUGGESTION1 applied and SUGGESTION4 considered (margin has decent userCount). No ts_backfill. Confidence 0.72 due to quality tilt benefits.

results.idea: Momentum residualized on size (logcap neutralized)
results.description: Divide momentum by beta to logcap using rsk62_beta_5_100_logcap. SUGGESTION1 applied. High userCount on beta_logcap. Confidence 0.70 for reducing size bias.

results.idea: Short-term reversal for low-liquidity names
results.description: Reverse 3-day returns and overweight low ADV via rsk62_logadv20_di. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.59 as illiquid reversals are riskier.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of factor 20-day mean
results.description: Use rsk62_factor_1_100_val53 (factor) and cross-sectional zscore to capture factor extremes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65 because factor extremes can revert.

results.idea: Short-term momentum filtered by volatility regime
results.description: Multiply 10-day momentum by inverse of beta volatility rsk62_beta_5_100_volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverage high. Confidence 0.66 since regime filtering helps.

results.idea: Industry-specific momentum (industry retseries zscore)
results.description: Use rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val23 (industry retseries). Applied SUGGESTION2 vec_avg and cross-sectional zscore. Confidence 0.60 for industry rotation validity.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by specific risk (avoid high idiosyncratic risk)
results.description: Divide momentum by rsk62_1_100_ksrs to penalize noisy names. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields high coverage. Confidence 0.69 to reduce noise.

results.idea: Earnings surprise-style: recent nipe acceleration
results.description: Use ts_delta on rsk62_risk_nipe to detect accelerating net income per employee and combine with returns. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence 0.64 for fundamental surprise signals.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of factor-return trend
results.description: Use rsk62_factor_5_100_val100 to compute trend zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63 as factor trends are meaningful cross-sectionally.

results.idea: Mean reversion scaled by industry volatility
results.description: Reverse short returns and weight by industry volatility (rsk62_beta_5_100_volatility). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage OK. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Vector-summed factor strength (vec_sum of factor retseries)
results.description: Use rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val5 (vector). Applied SUGGESTION2 vec_sum to capture cumulative factor moves. Kept to one datafield. Confidence 0.58 as sum may amplify noise.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on growth (eps growth)
results.description: Combine ts_zscore of returns with rsk62_risk_growth. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 used (growth has many alphas). No backfill. Confidence 0.71: growth-conditioned momentum has improved signal.

results.idea: Volume spike momentum using ADV di index
results.description: Use rsk62_logadv20_di as a DI to detect volume anomalies and combine with returns. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60 for implementation ease.

results.idea: Cross-asset beta neutral momentum (neutralize with intercept)
results.description: Subtract intercept rsk62_1_100_intercept influence from returns. SUGGESTION1 applied; intercept has high alphaCount. Confidence 0.67 for cleaner cross-asset signal.

results.idea: Momentum acceleration (ts_zscore of ts_delta of returns)
results.description: Use ts_delta on rsk62_1_100_return and then ts_zscore to capture accelerating momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.72 for capturing trend strengthening.

results.idea: Factor pair trade: long factor A, short factor B
results.description: Use two high-coverage factor returns rsk62_factor_1_100_val40 and rsk62_factor_5_100_val24; subtract their zscores. SUGGESTION1 used (2 fields). Confidence 0.60 due to co-movement risk.

results.idea: Short-term reversal filtered by cap (avoid smallest caps)
results.description: Reverse 3-day returns and multiply by inverse logcap beta rsk62_beta_5_100_logcap to de-emphasize microcaps. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Volatility breakout (ts_arg_max on returns)
results.description: Identify recent maxima in returns using ts_arg_max on rsk62_1_100_return to capture breakouts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57 as breakouts can be noisy.

results.idea: Momentum residualized on volatility (regression residual)
results.description: Use ts_regression residual of returns on risk volatility rsk62_risk_volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. High coverage fields used. Confidence 0.68 for cleaner signal.

results.idea: Quality-growth composite: margin * growth zscore
results.description: Multiply zscores of rsk62_risk_margin and rsk62_risk_growth to favor high-quality growers. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Both high-use. Confidence 0.70 for long-term outperformance potential.

results.idea: Negative earnings surprise contrarian (backfilled nipe)
results.description: Use rsk62_risk_backfill_nipe (backfilled) per SUGGESTION3 since nipe backfill available; combine with short-term reversal. Applied SUGGESTION4 by choosing backfill field with high userCount. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Vectorized industry momentum vs stock momentum spread
results.description: Compare vec_avg of rsk62_retseries_industry_5_100_val17 to ts_mean of stock returns. SUGGESTION2 applied for vector industry field and SUGGESTION1 for return. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Long-short by factor zscore ranks
results.description: Rank cross-sectional rsk62_factor_1_100_val24 with zscore for long-short. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66 for factor-based rank strategies.

results.idea: Momentum with turnover control (hump)
results.description: Apply hump to 20-day momentum to smooth trading (reduce turnover). SUGGESTION1 applied; hump helps KEEP_IN_MIND on turnover. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Cross-sectional dispersion signal (returns / industry std)
results.description: Divide instrument recent return by industry std (rsk62_industry_1_100_val100 used as industry proxy). SUGGESTION1 applied for two fields. Confidence 0.60 for dispersion signals.

results.idea: Short-term momentum after volume contraction
results.description: Detect low volume via rsk62_logadv20_di and then apply short momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Beta-neutral momentum (subtract market beta influence)
results.description: Subtract exposure to rsk62_beta_1_100_logadv20 from momentum to reduce market-beta that correlates with adv. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Industry reversion (industry 10-day reversal)
results.description: Apply reverse on industry returns rsk62_industry_1_100_val31 to capture industry mean reversion. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION2 (if using retseries) considered; used simple industry field. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Return/Volume momentum (returns / ADV ratio)
results.description: Divide ts_mean returns by logadv (rsk62_logadv20_di) to favor returns in relative liquidity context. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Short-term price reversal in high-specific-risk names
results.description: Reverse short returns and multiply by specific risk rsk62_1_100_ksrs to focus where reversion is likelier. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Factor momentum with ts_decay (recent weight emphasis)
results.description: Use ts_decay_linear effect via ts_zscore on recent factor mean rsk62_factor_5_100_val55. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Cross-sectional low-volatility long-short
results.description: Rank instruments by inverse volatility using rsk62_beta_1_100_volatility and take zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68 for low-vol premium.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by gross margin improvement
results.description: Multiply momentum by ts_delta on rsk62_risk_margin to favor improving margins. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Return seasonality: day-count from last change
results.description: Use days_from_last_change on rsk62_1_100_return to detect stale trends. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55; seasonal signals weaker.

results.idea: Momentum vs industry beta spread
results.description: Subtract industry beta exposure (rsk62_beta_5_100_mtl) from stock momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Earnings yield momentum (nipe per cap)
results.description: Combine rsk62_risk_nipe with returns; use divide to create yield-like metric. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Vector average industry correlation (vec_avg of industry retseries)
results.description: Use vec_avg(rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val3) to capture industry average movement and zscore it. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum minus sector expected return (beta industry constr)
results.description: Subtract rsk62_beta_industry_constr_1_100_banks exposure from stock momentum for bank-heavy names. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage adequate. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Return / specific risk (signal-to-noise)
results.description: Divide recent return by specific risk rsk62_1_100_ksrs to favor high SNR names. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorize to reduce outliers
results.description: Apply winsorize to 20-day momentum to mitigate outliers as per KEEP_IN_MIND for robustness. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low sector concentration
results.description: Multiply stock momentum by inverse of group concentration proxied by rsk62_industry_1_100_val100 (used simply as industry activity). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum after baseline correction using intercept
results.description: Subtract long-term intercept rsk62_1_100_intercept from momentum to remove common trend. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Short-term factor mean-reversion (factor retseries argmin)
results.description: Use ts_arg_min on vec_avg(rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val3) to find recent troughs in factor returns. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum combined with PB (book-to-price) tilt
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse book proxy rsk62_beta_1_100_pb to favor value-like low PB when momentum present. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Liquidity-adjusted mean reversion
results.description: Reverse 5-day returns and scale by logadv beta rsk62_beta_5_100_logadv20. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Volatility breakout filtered by industry trend
results.description: Detect stock return argmax and require industry 5-day trend via rsk62_retseries_industry_5_100_val12. SUGGESTION2 applied for industry retseries vec_avg. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by earnings per share beta
results.description: Multiply return momentum by rsk62_beta_factor_5_100_spe (earnings per share) to favor momentum in EPS-strong names. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short-term momentum with target turnover control (ts_target_tvr_hump)
results.description: Use hump tuned to target turnover on momentum per KEEP_IN_MIND to control trading cost. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Return acceleration vs factor acceleration
results.description: Compare ts_delta of returns and ts_delta of factor rsk62_factor_1_100_val53; subtract to find divergence. SUGGESTION1 used 2 fields. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Cross-sectional kurtosis spike (ts_kurtosis of returns)
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis on rsk62_1_100_return to find days of extreme cross-sectional tails and trade accordingly. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54; niche signal.

results.idea: Short-term momentum scaled by net income per employee beta
results.description: Multiply momentum by ts_zscore(rsk62_beta_5_100_nipe) to favor names with income productivity exposure. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Industry mean-reversion after extreme run
results.description: Apply ts_max_diff on rsk62_industry_5_100_val98 to find overextended industries then reverse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on low current ratio risk
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse current ratio risk rsk62_risk_curratio to avoid financially weak companies. SUGGESTION1 applied and SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Cross-sectional quantile momentum (top/bottom quantiles)
results.description: Use quantile on 20-day returns to select extremes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66 for robust quantile-based selection.

results.idea: Mean-reversion at high industry dispersion
results.description: Reverse stock returns when industry dispersion (ts_std_dev of industry retseries) is high. Used rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val15 and rsk62_1_100_return. SUGGESTION2 & SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum re-ranked by factor exposure (group-neutral via intercept)
results.description: Subtract common intercept rsk62_1_100_intercept from momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied; intercept high-use. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion after high ADV spikes
results.description: Reverse 2-day returns when ADV (rsk62_logadv20_di) is above median. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Factor momentum with winsorized factor
results.description: Compute factor momentum on rsk62_factor_5_100_val93 and winsorize to reduce tails. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum combined with REITs exposure control
results.description: Subtract rsk62_beta_5_100_reits exposure from momentum to avoid REIT-driven distortions. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market cap beta (logcap)
results.description: Divide momentum by rsk62_beta_5_100_logcap to reduce cap bias. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Return momentum after sustained up-days (ts_count_nans as proxy for activity)
results.description: Use ts_count_nans on retseries to detect low-activity periods and trade momentum after activity returns. SUGGESTION2 applied where retseries used. Confidence 0.53 (specialized).

results.idea: Momentum & margin divergence (stock vs factor margin)
results.description: Subtract factor-margin trend rsk62_beta_factor_5_100_margin from stock returns momentum. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term momentum scaled by earnings per share beta
results.description: Multiply 10-day momentum by rsk62_beta_5_100_spe to favor EPS-exposed winners. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Long-term momentum with ts_product
results.description: Use ts_product of returns over 60 days to capture compounding trend on rsk62_1_100_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.70 for persistent trends.

results.idea: Industry divergence: industry zscore vs market
results.description: Compute zscore of industry return rsk62_industry_5_100_val83 minus market mean (rsk62_1_100_intercept). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with vector stddev filter (vec_stddev)
results.description: Use vec_stddev on factor retseries rsk62_retseries_factor_1_100_val19 to avoid volatile factor days. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum plus margin-backfill robustness
results.description: Use rsk62_risk_backfill_margin per SUGGESTION3 to handle margin missingness and combine with returns. SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Short-term reversal in high-volatility regimes
results.description: Reverse 3-day returns only when market volatility di rsk62_volatility_di is high. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on stable capital structure (low qe2d)
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse debt-to-equity beta rsk62_beta_5_100_qe2d to avoid distressed firms. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Factor momentum rank combined (aggregate factor zscores)
results.description: Add zscores of two complementary factors rsk62_factor_1_100_val24 and rsk62_factor_1_100_val40 to form composite. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 fields). Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term reversal when industry beta constrained low-coverage (backfill)
results.description: Use rsk62_beta_industry_constr_5_100_telecommunications which has coverage<0.6; applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3 then combine with reversal. Confidence 0.52 due to limited coverage.

results.idea: Momentum with pb backfill robustness
results.description: If pb had missingness we'd backfill; rsk62_beta_1_100_pb has coverage=1 so no backfill needed. SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing high-use pb. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Return anomaly using factor-intercept spread
results.description: Subtract rsk62_1_100_intercept from factor rsk62_factor_5_100_val100 to get pure factor signal. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by beta to volatility to penalize high beta volatility
results.description: Divide momentum by beta_volatility rsk62_beta_1_100_volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Vector-average factor divergence (vec_avg difference)
results.description: Take vec_avg of two factor retseries rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val17 and rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val19 and compute spread. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum combined with consumer cyclicality control (food beta)
results.description: Adjust momentum by rsk62_beta_5_100_food to reduce cyclicality exposure. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum filtered for low group count (group_count proxy)
results.description: Use group_count idea via industry counts (use rsk62_industry_1_100_val100 as proxy) to avoid crowded groups. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_scale (time normalization)
results.description: Apply ts_scale to recent returns to normalize within time window before zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term momentum after earnings-adjusted growth
results.description: Multiply momentum by ts_zscore of rsk62_growth_di to favor names with recent eps growth. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum residualized on specific risk via ts_regression
results.description: Compute regression residual of returns on specific risk rsk62_1_100_ksrs to isolate predictive component. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum with industry backfill safety net
results.description: If industry beta field has lower coverage we would ts_backfill; using rsk62_industry_5_100_val63 coverage=1 so backfill not needed. SUGGESTION3 considered and not applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum with ts_quantile normalization
results.description: Use ts_quantile on 20-day returns to map to gaussian quantiles for stable scaling. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on low beta to mining exposure
results.description: Multiply momentum by inverse rsk62_beta_5_100_mining to avoid commodity beta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Vector-averaged sector momentum overlay
results.description: Use vec_avg on rsk62_retseries_industry_1_100_val7 to create sector overlay. SUGGESTION2 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Momentum with momentum-of-momentum (second derivative)
results.description: Use ts_delta on ts_delta of returns to capture acceleration of acceleration. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Return momentum scaled by market intercept exposure
results.description: Divide momentum by intercept rsk62_1_100_intercept to remove market-wide scaling. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum combined with retseries tail trimming
results.description: Apply tail operator to momentum to cap mid-range values and reduce extremes. SUGGESTION1 applied; tail reduces extreme beta. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low electronics industry exposure
results.description: Subtract electronics industry beta rsk62_beta_5_100_electronics from momentum to avoid tech cyclicality. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum normalized by ts_scale over 60 days
results.description: Apply ts_scale to 60-day returns to normalize across time windows, per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Return acceleration vs industry max (ts_arg_max spread)
results.description: Compare ts_arg_max of stock returns to industry ts_arg_max via rsk62_industry_5_100_val71. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum with group zscore neutralization
results.description: Use group_zscore on returns with group='sector' to neutralize sector biases (requires grouping). SUGGESTION1 applied with group operator per KEEP_IN_MIND4. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Mean-reversion after large factor drawdowns
results.description: Reverse stock returns when a major factor rsk62_factor_1_100_val92 has negative extreme zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by industry expected return (beta factor)
results.description: Subtract rsk62_beta_5_100_software expected industry return exposure from momentum to remove software-driven trends. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Return momentum cross-validated with retseries consistency
results.description: Require that vec_avg of factor retseries rsk62_retseries_factor_5_100_val11 confirms stock momentum before trading (SUGGESTION2). Confidence 0.55.
